name: Sleigher (itch)
description:
Santa needs to finish delivering presents to all the children, however, Evil Krampus has amassed terrifying horde and they are trying to destroy Christmas!

Finish delivering your presents with the aid of your dinosaur friends, defeat Krampus and save Christmas.

I created this game for 2019 Yogscast Game Jam using GameMaker Studio2, it was a very fun game to make and play, I am very happy with how it turned out for my first ever Jam!
